data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 28970, Version Hash: 4fdb14779d8bec822f8620df712b787e62091c9b
data.expected_result: Discord shouldn't crash and instead handle the error normally
data.short_description: Spamming an image and trying again crashes the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Take a snapshot of something so you have an image on your clipboard (Not a link). Windows + Shift + S for something quick. - Get to a channel where you can spam without getting punished for it and you can post images at. - Spam paste the image, Ctrl + V and then enter until an error pops up. (Don't hit enter when the error pops up or else it will pop up again and you may not be able to recreate the error!) - When the error pops up, *quickly* click on "Click here to retry the upload" button. Please mind you may fail to recreate the bug on the first try, try more than once!
